alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sullivan and southeastern Scott Counties and the City of Bristol through 415 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colonial Heights, or near Kingsport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Walnut Hill, Colonial Heights, Bluff City, Morril`s Cave, Warriors Path State Park, Tri-City Airport and Blountville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
